name: Life is pretty short
description:
Welcome to the life! It's pretty short, so... use it wisely ( and most importantly, dont die)

Be sociable, play, eat, drink, etc... or even smoke, use drugs, kill yourself...

Made with Unity2d for the Weekly Game Jam: Week 115: Life is short.

Any feedback is welcome as I was stressed about time and didn't playtest enough.

Newsgeek font by Void : https://frankqbe.tumblr.com/
